long_description: The Nikon Travelite VI 12 x 25 binoculars pack a lot of power into a little package. They weigh under 10 oz. and offer sharp imagery with minimal distortion. Aspherical lenses eliminate virtually all distortion; close focus distance of 13.1 ft. lets you study nature up close. Multicoated optics provide bright image and glare reduction; BaK4 high-index Porro prisms provide a clear, crisp image. Quick central focusing with clicking diopter control fine-tunes each eyepiece for strain-free viewing. Eye relief of 11.1mm accommodates the use of eye glasses. Ergonomically contoured, lightweight carbon fiber body reduces hand fatigue during long viewing sessions. Rugged all-metal chassis is covered with durable black rubber armor that adds shock resistance and a positive grip in slippery conditions. Nikon Travelite VI 12 x 25 binoculars come with a lens caps, carrying case and neck strap included.
short_description: The Nikon Travelite VI 12 x 25 binoculars pack a lot of power into a little package. They weigh under 10 oz. and offer sharp imagery with minimal distortion.
